hint.en:
(Gilfoyle) It's an alert. Whenever the price of Bitcoin dips below a certain value, it's no longer efficient to mine. Comes back up, it is. So, I need to know when it breaks that threshold so I can remotely toggle my rig at home.
(Richard) OK... any idea how often that might happen?
(Gilfoyle) Bitcoin is very volatile so... *HGEFBLURGH* a lot.
